title: SwapDRC Lite
author: OatmealDome and Yahya14
description: Switch TV display onto the gamepad
details:
Switch Display, Audio, and Gamepad Sensor Bar:
	- Press the TV button.
	
	Switch on/off Gamepad LCD:
	- Press and hold R-Stick for 3-6 seconds.
	
	Special thanks to: Maschell, dimok, NWPlayer123, Brienj, and BKOOL999.
